messages.title: Ghost Pistol
messages.body: Bring the Haunts to the Mist Monsters with Homebase's favorite Ghostly weapon... the Ghost Pistol!

messages.title: Dire
messages.body: Howl at the moon... and the Husks with this returning Ninja!

messages.title: Clip's Nightmare
messages.body: A nauseating spell in Hexsylvania. A gunsmith haunted by a figure from her past. Help Homebase dispel the curse before it's too late!
